details.description:
Hannah joined the ODI in September 2015 to oversee and implement the ODI’s digital marketing strategy. Her role is to ensure that all digital communication – from the website to social media – is enhancing the ODI’s relationship with its network.

Hannah previously led all digital marketing for City Lit, London’s largest college for adults, where she project managed the launch of a complete e-commerce platform – the first ever created for education. She also created the award-winning Curious Courses where participants would only discover what they were learning after arriving at the college. Before joining City Lit, she worked for three years as part of the marketing team at Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design.

Hannah has an MA in Journalism from the University of the Arts and often blogs about interesting things going on around town for Londonist.com. Hannah also enjoys fundraising and has trekked Mount Kilimanjaro, the Great Wall of China, the Lares Trail in Peru and the Sahara Desert for charity.
